backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two Valentine features to their associated frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of all frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls screen state transitions between opening, transition, and final celebration screens.
frontend/src/components/valentine/consta: Defines static Valentine UI strings, no‑button messages, and celebration screen text.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FinalC: Displays the final celebration view with floating hearts, teddy bear GIF, heart emojis, and optional music.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Firewo: Canvas component rendering pink fireworks with rising rockets, burst rings, and particle effects.
frontend/src/components/valentine/NoButt: Floating 'No' button that relocates to random on‑screen positions on each click while staying within safe viewport bounds.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Renders the main Valentine prompt with changing messages, yes/no buttons, and animated decorations.
frontend/src/components/valentine/PopHea: Generates floating heart elements on a timed loop with a cap on concurrent hearts.
frontend/src/components/valentine/YesTra: Shows a fade‑to‑black transition with timed fireworks before invoking a completion callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are needed for this project.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup and custom animations, colors, and styles for the Valentine theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, and custom settings for the Valentine UI.
project_state.json: Stores project state and requirements for fixing the Valentine page so the No button stays visible, moves on every click, and message cycling loops until Yes is pressed.
